name: note-mark
description: NoteMark is a Markdown-based note-taking system for quick writing and organizing ideas. It supports syntax highlighting, tagging, and a minimalist self-hosted UI ideal for personal usage.
features: Markdown editor: Write notes using Markdown syntax with live preview rendering.
Syntax highlighting: Code blocks display with language-specific syntax coloring.
Tag system: Organize notes with tags for quick filtering and categorization.
Full-text search: Find notes instantly by searching titles, content, or tags.
Minimalist UI: Clean, distraction-free interface focused on writing and reading.
Note linking: Create connections between related notes with wiki-style links.
Version history: Track changes to notes and restore previous versions if needed.
Export options: Download notes as Markdown, HTML, or PDF for sharing or backup.
Dark mode: Eye-friendly theme for comfortable writing in low-light conditions.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and edit notes efficiently with customizable hotkeys.
Lightweight deployment: Minimal resource requirements suitable for personal servers.
Privacy-first: All notes stored locally on your server with no external dependencies.
